text: Welcome to our exploration of renewable energy using hologram box!
Renewable energy comes from natural sources that are constantly replenished.
Some key types of renewable energy include:
Solar energy: harnessed from the sun
Wind energy: generated by moving air
Geothermal energy: drawn from the heat of the Earth
Today, we will focus on solar energy--how it works and why it is vital for a sustainable future! Let’s dive in and see it all come alive through the hologram box.
Let’s dive in and see it all come alive through the hologram box.
